For Agencies For Businesses Case Studies About

Case Study

Holland

Commercial construction

Joint agency rebuild with Kestrel and Dovetail that turned the Holland site into a Kadence + custom-block experience with CPT-driven filters and tabbed storytelling.

Visit live site

Challenge

What they needed

Holland’s legacy marketing site looked outdated, scattered work by sector, and lacked the filtering and CMS flexibility needed for the Kestrel + Dovetail team to tell the whole story without developer help.

Approach

How we solved it

Partnered with Kestrel and Dovetail to translate their Figma redesign into a Kadence-powered WordPress build. Delivered bespoke Gutenberg blocks, CPTs, and a filter/tab system that lets sales and marketing surface projects, services, and regions with just a few clicks.

Completed

December 2024

Website

https://www.hollandcs.com/

Stack highlights

  • WordPress
  • Kadence
  • Advanced Custom Fields
  • Alpine.js
  • PHP
  • Figma
